Deborah Sills

deborahsills.com

My name is Deborah Sills, and I'm an Assistant Professor in the Civil & Environmental Engineering Department at Bucknell University. My research focuses on sustainable production of biofuels and bioproducts. I use laboratory studies and modeling techniques—such as life cycle assessment—to develop and improve the environmental performance of bioenergy production. In addition, I am interested in developing energy-efficient wastewater treatment processes to be used in developing countries.

Professional

My academic vita

Teaching
